      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a wallboard.
      boolean Floorplan.canTearDown(Wallboard wallboard)
      checks if cell (x,y) and adjacent neighbor in the given direction are not separated by a border and the neighbor has not been visited before.
      void Floorplan.deleteWallboard(Wallboard wallboard)
      Delete both wallboards between to adjacent cells (x,y) and (x+dx,y+dy) to create an opening.
      boolean Floorplan.isPartOfBorder(Wallboard wallboard)
      checks if the given wallboard contributes to a border.
